sections.heading: Definitions, where found.For purposes of the Municipal Initiative and Referendum Act, the definitions in sections 18-2502
sections.text: 01 to 18-2511, unless the context otherwise requires, shall apply.SourceLaws 1982, LB 807, ยง 2;Laws 1984, LB 1010, ยง 1;Laws 2021, LB163, ยง 165.
